title: Boards say I’m level 7... I’m level 30 and have been
body:
I tried to post a reply, but the boards say I’m only level 7?

I play ranked, I’ve spent money on the account and I’ve been 30 for a while. Why does it do this?

Side note, apparently I can make a discussion but not post in threads.

replies.body: Your account needs to sync to the boards when first posting.  Everything looks to be okay now!
